titleStmt.title: The life of the learned Sir Thomas Smith, Kt., doctor of the civil law principal secretary of state to King Edward the Sixth, and Queen Elizabeth : wherein are discovered many singular matters ... With an appendix, wherein are contained some works of his, never before published.
titleStmt.author: Strype, John, 1643-1737.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Duke University Library.
